17: וְנָשְׂא֨וּ <sup>5375 </sup> <n>And they shall take up</n> עָלַ֤יִךְ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>over</n> קִינָה֙ <sup>7015 </sup> <n>a lamentation</n> וְאָ֣מְרוּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>for thee and say</n> לָ֔ךְ אֵ֣יךְ <sup>349 </sup> <n>How</n> אָבַ֔דְתְּ <sup>6 </sup> <n>to thee How art thou destroyed</n> נוֹשֶׁ֖בֶת <sup>3427 </sup> <n>[that wast] inhabited</n> מִיַּמִּ֑ים <sup>3220 </sup> <n>of seafaring men</n> הָעִ֣יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>city</n> הַהֻלָּ֗לָה <sup>1984 </sup> <n>the renowned</n> אֲשֶׁר֩ <sup>834 </sup> <n>Which</n> הָיְתָ֨ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> חֲזָקָ֤ה <sup>2389 </sup> <n>which wast strong</n> בַיָּם֙ <sup>3220 </sup> <n>in the sea</n> הִ֣יא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>and her</n> וְיֹשְׁבֶ֔יהָ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>she and her inhabitants</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>Who</n> נָתְנ֥וּ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>which cause</n> חִתִּיתָ֖ם <sup>2851 </sup> <n>their terror</n> לְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> יוֹשְׁבֶֽיהָ׃ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>[to be] on all that haunt</n>
18: עַתָּה֙ <sup>6258 </sup> <n>Now</n> יֶחְרְד֣וּ <sup>2729 </sup> <n>tremble</n> הָֽאִיִּ֔ן <sup>339 </sup> <n>Now shall the isles</n> י֖וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>in the day</n> מַפַּלְתֵּ֑ךְ <sup>4658 </sup> <n>of thy fall</n> וְנִבְהֲל֛וּ <sup>926 </sup> <n>shall be troubled</n> הָאִיִּ֥ים <sup>339 </sup> <n>yea the isles</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> בַּיָּ֖ם <sup>3220 </sup> <n>that [are] in the sea</n> מִצֵּאתֵֽךְ׃ <sup>3318 </sup> <n>at thy departure</n> ס
19: כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>For</n> כֹ֤ה <sup>3541 </sup> <n>thus</n> אָמַר֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>For thus saith</n> אֲדֹנָ֣י <sup>136 </sup> <n>the Lord</n> יְהוִ֔ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>GOD</n> בְּתִתִּ֤י <sup>5414 </sup> <n>When I shall make</n> אֹתָךְ֙ <sup>853 </sup> עִ֣יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>city</n> נֶחֱרֶ֔בֶת <sup>2717 </sup> <n>thee a desolate</n> כֶּעָרִ֖ים <sup>5892 </sup> <n>like the cities</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>are not</n> נוֹשָׁ֑בוּ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>that are not inhabited</n> בְּהַעֲל֤וֹת <sup>5927 </sup> <n>when I shall bring up</n> עָלַ֙יִךְ֙ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>over</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> תְּה֔וֹם <sup>8415 </sup> <n>the deep</n> וְכִסּ֖וּךְ <sup>3680 </sup> <n>shall cover</n> הַמַּ֥יִם <sup>4325 </sup> <n>waters</n> הָרַבִּֽים׃ <sup>7227 </sup> <n>upon thee and great</n>
20: וְהוֹרַדְתִּיךְ֩ <sup>3381 </sup> <n>When I shall bring thee down</n> אֶת־ <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n> י֨וֹרְדֵי <sup>3381 </sup> <n>with them that descend</n> ב֜וֹר <sup>953 </sup> <n>into the pit</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> עַ֣ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>with the people</n> עוֹלָ֗ם <sup>5769 </sup> <n>of old time</n> וְ֠הוֹשַׁבְתִּיךְ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>and shall set</n> בְּאֶ֨רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>of the earth</n> תַּחְתִּיּ֜וֹת <sup>8482 </sup> <n>thee in the low parts</n> כָּחֳרָב֤וֹת <sup>2723 </sup> <n>in places desolate</n> מֵֽעוֹלָם֙ <sup>5769 </sup> <n>of old</n> אֶת־ <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n> י֣וֹרְדֵי <sup>3381 </sup> <n>with them that go down</n> ב֔וֹר <sup>953 </sup> <n>to the pit</n> לְמַ֖עַן <sup>4616 </sup> <n>so</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> תֵשֵׁ֑בִי <sup>3427 </sup> <n>that thou be not inhabited</n> וְנָתַתִּ֥י <sup>5414 </sup> <n>and I shall set</n> צְבִ֖י <sup>6643 </sup> <n>glory</n> בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>in the land</n> חַיִּֽים׃ <sup>2416 </sup> <n>of the living</n>
21: בַּלָּה֥וֹת <sup>1091 </sup> <n>thee a terror</n> אֶתְּנֵ֖ךְ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>I will make</n> וְאֵינֵ֑ךְ <sup>369 </sup> <n>will be no</n> וּֽתְבֻקְשִׁ֗י <sup>1245 </sup> <n>and thou [shalt be] no [more] though thou be sought for</n> וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> תִמָּצְאִ֥י <sup>4672 </sup> <n>be found</n> עוֹד֙ <sup>5750 </sup> <n>again</n> לְעוֹלָ֔ם <sup>5769 </sup> <n>yet shalt thou never</n> נְאֻ֖ם <sup>5002 </sup> <n>again saith</n> אֲדֹנָ֥י <sup>136 </sup> <n>the Lord</n> יְהֹוִֽה׃ <sup>3069 </sup> <n>GOD</n> ס
